title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.12 - Municipal governing body to make written findings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4830.12 - Municipal governing body to make written findings

State Regulations

When the suspension or revocation proceedings are begun
before the municipal governing body that issued the license, such municipal
governing body shall hear the matter and make written findings in support of
such municipal governing decision. The licensee and the commission shall be
notified immediately in writing of the decision and, in the event of a
suspension or revocation, the effective date thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4830.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
